meanings.definition: People who live in a foreign country.
meanings.sent1: Many expats in this city come from different countries.
meanings.sent2: The expats in our neighborhood have a diverse background.
meanings.sent3: The expats at the international school bring unique perspectives to the classroom.
meanings.sent4: In a way, expats are like cultural ambassadors bridging different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The expats' potluck showcased dishes from around the globe.

meanings.definition: To live in a foreign country.
meanings.sent1: My aunt decided to expats in Europe for a year.
meanings.sent2: They plan to expats in Asia after their wedding.
meanings.sent3: We dream of expats on a tropical island someday.
meanings.sent4: Sometimes, it feels like we expats in a different universe.
meanings.sent5: The couple will expats in South America for work.
